verbose_text: We discuss the de-repression of tumor suppressors such as BRCA-1, nuclear factor erythroid 2 related factor 2 (NRF2) and Ras Associated Domain family-1alpha (RASSF-1alpha) by methylation, PAX1 by acetylation and the phosphatase and tensin homologue (PTEN) by both methylation and acetylation, in addition to the epigenetic regulation of oncogenic NF-kappaB and STAT3 signaling by resveratrol.
